name: pseudo-code-prompting
description: Transform natural language into structured, validated pseudo-code with session memory, context-aware architecture analysis, semantic caching, and intelligent path injection - 8 skills, 5 agents, 6 commands, 4 hooks with persistent memory for pattern learning and preference retention

plugins.name: pseudo-code-prompting
plugins.description: Transform natural language requirements into structured, validated pseudo-code with session memory, context-aware architecture analysis, and semantic caching. Includes 8 skills (with session-memory), 5 agents, 6 commands, and 4 hooks with persistent memory for pattern learning, user preference retention, and quality improvement over time.
